text: An Optimistic Tragedy () is a 1963 Soviet war drama movie directed by Samson Samsonov.Дочь Вячеслава Тихонова рассказала о совете ВангиОПТИМИСТИЧЕСКАЯ ТРАГЕДИЯ It stars Margarita Volodina, Boris Andreyev, and Vyacheslav Tikhonov. ==Actors== * Margarita Volodina as Commissar * Boris Andreyev as Vozhak * Vyacheslav Tikhonov as Aleksey * Vsevolod Sanayev as Sipliy * Erast Garin as Vozhachok * Vsevolod Safonov * Oleg Strizhenov as First officer == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet war movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:1963 war movies Category:1963 drama movies Category:Russian drama movies Category:Russian war movies Category:Movies directed by Samson Samsonov
title: An Optimistic Tragedy (movie)
